name: antonstoeckl/zend-cache-backend-mongo
description: Zend_Cache_Backend_Mongo is a Zend Framework <http://zendframework.com/> Backend for MongoDB <http://www.mongodb.org/>. It supports tags and autocleaning.Xajax is an open source PHP class library for easily creating powerful PHP-driven, web-based Ajax Applications. Using Xajax, you can asynchronously call PHP functions and update the content of your your webpage without reloading the page.
